title: Candy Man
lyrics:
[intro] (E)  (B)  (A)  (E)
 
(E)Who can take a sun rise? (Who can take a sun rise?)
(B)Sprinkle it with dew? (Sprinkle it with dew?)
(A)Cover it in chocolate and a (E)miracle or two
The (A)Candy Man (The Candy Man)
The (E)Candy Man can (The Candy Man can)
The (B)Candy Man can because he (A)mixes it with love and makes the
(E)World taste good (Makes world taste good)
 
(E)Who can take a rainbow (Who can take a rainbow)
(B)Warp it in a sigh (Warp it in a sigh)
(A)Soak it in the sun and make a (E)groovy lemon pie
The (A)Candy Man (The Candy Man)
The (E)Candy Man can (The Candy Man can)
The (B)Candy Man can because he (A) mixes it with love and makes the
(E)World taste good (Makes world taste good)
 
The (A)Candy man makes (E)everything he bakes
(Cm)Satisfying and de-(E)li-cious
Now you (A)talk about good childhood (E)wishes
(A)You can even eat the (B)dishes!
 
(E)Who can take tomorrow (Who can take tomorrow)
(B)Dip it in a dream (Dip it in a dream)
(A)Separate the sour and col-(E)-lect up all the cream
The (A)Candy Man (The Candy Man)
The (E)Candy Man can (The Candy Man can)
The (B)Candy Man can because he (A)mixes it with love and makes the
(E)World taste good (Makes world taste good)
 
The (A)Candy man makes (E)everything he bakes
(Cm)Satisfying and de-(E)li-cious
Now you (A)talk about good childhood (E)wishes
(A)You can even eat the (B)dishes!
 
(E)Who can take tomorrow (Who can take tomorrow)
(B)Dip it in a dream (Dip it in a dream)
(A)Separate the sour and col-(E)-lect up all the cream
The (A)Candy Man (The Candy Man)
The (E)Candy Man can (The Candy Man can)
The (B)Candy Man can because he (A)mixes it with love and makes the
(E)World taste good (Makes world taste good)
The (B)Candy man can because he (A)mixes it with love and makes the
(E)World taste good (Makes world taste good)
(E-single strum) [end]
